info.name: [SH17A] Raindrops
info.description: Raindrops on a window. Better without fullscreen.

renderpass.code:
#define mainImage(c, f) vec2 u = f / iResolution.xy; c = texture(iChannel1, u - texture(iChannel0, u).xy)
//#define mainImage(c, u) c = texelFetch(iChannel0, ivec2(u), 0)
renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
#define T texelFetch(iChannel0,ivec2(
#define mainImage(c, f) vec2 u = f; c -= c -(max(T u++),0).x *.8,T u.x + fract(sin(u.y*.1)), u.y),0).x*.9) + max(9.-dot(u-= fract(iTime*vec2(678,789))*9e2,u),0.))
renderpass.name: Buf A
